div.h2: Welcome to Honeoye Falls-Lima Central School

div.p: The mission of Honeoye Falls-Lima School District is to ensure students display the knowledge, skills and character qualities needed to realize their aspirations and succeed in a rapidly changing world.

a.title: We asked. You Responded. We listened. - Thoughtexchange

div.a: We asked. You Responded. We listened. - Thoughtexchange

div.h2: Watch Board of Education Meetings Live

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

div.span:
In response to School Closures due to the COVID-19 outbreak, in person meetings of the Board of Education are being suspended. The HF-L Board of Education will meet via video chat/streaming until further notice. New York State has recently changed the rules of public meeting laws to allow this. We have tested the technology and are confident that we will be able to allow the public to access the meetings.
A live-video link will be posted here when meetings are occurring.
April 14, 2020 - 7PM
If you have questions or comments during a Board Meeting, please email District Clerk, Rhonda Schaefer rhonda.schaefer@hflcsd.org. Someone will follow-up with you at a later time.
Please, also click on the Enter Public Site link to access BoardDocs, HF-L's user friendly platform for accessing Board of Education materials and pre-recorded meetings.
Or, click here for a list of previously recorded meetings.

a.title: POSTPONED: Board of Education Public Budget Hearing & Meet the Candidates Night
a.span: POSTPONED: Board of Education Public Budget Hearing & Meet the Candidates Night

div.p: The Honeoye Falls-Lima Central School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs, activities, employment, and admissions; and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.

The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies: David Leahy, Compliance Officer/Coordinator, at: Email - David.Leahy@hflcsd.org, Telephone - (585) 624-7181, Address - 20 Church Street, Honeoye Falls, NY 14472. Inquiries concerning the application of the Honeoye Falls-Lima Central School District non-discrimination policies may also be referred to the U.S. Department of Education, Office for Civil Rights (OCR), 32 Old Slip, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10005, Telephone (646) 428-3800 (voice) or (800) 877-8339 (TTY).

div.div: 20 Church Street, Honeoye Falls, NY 14472 | Phone 585-624-7000 | Fax 585-624-7003
